body.name: Saie Glowy Super Gel Lightweight Illuminator - Luminizer for Glowing Skin, Wear Alone or Under Makeup - Starglow (0.5 fl oz)

features: Welcome to the glowiest, lightest weight luminizer. Wear it alone, under (or mixed with) foundation or tinted SPF as an illuminating primer, or wear it over any look for a super dewy, glowy finish. These skin glowing products feel like nothing, and look like everything.
The Glowy Super Gel plays well with most foundation. Use it for an all over dewy glow on your face, chest, collarbones, shoulders or legs.

Plant-Derived Glycerin is a powerful humectant to help increase skin’s natural moisture level. Vitamin C is known to brighten and refine skin’s appearance. Rose Hip Seed Oil is ultra rich in antioxidants to help visibly brighten and moisturize skin.

Use one to two pumps and apply after any serum, oil, or moisturizer. To glow your way: Mix a few drops into foundation, use it alone for an easy no-makeup moment, or prime with it under foundation or tinted SPF. Can be used over makeup.
No parabens, phthalates, sulfates, talc, mineral oil, GMOs, synthetic fragrance, or BHA. Cruelty-free dewy primer.
body.description: Welcome to the glowiest, lightest weight luminizer. Wear it alone, under (or mixed with) foundation or tinted SPF as an illuminating primer, or wear it over any look for a super dewy, glowy finish. These skin glowing products feel like nothing, and look like everything. The Glowy Super Gel plays well with most foundation. Use it for an all over dewy glow on your face, chest, collarbones, shoulders or legs.Plant-Derived Glycerin is a powerful humectant to help increase skin’s natural moisture level. Use one to two pumps and apply after any serum, oil, or moisturizer.To glow your way: Mix a few drops into foundation, use it alone for an easy no-makeup moment, or prime with it under foundation or tinted SPF. Can be used over makeup.No parabens, phthalates, sulfates, talc, mineral oil, GMOs, synthetic fragrance, or BHA. Cruelty-free dewy primer.Use 1-2 pumps and apply after any serum, oil or untinted moisturizer. Then glow your way. Mix a few drops into foundation. Use it alone for an easy no-makeup moment. Prime with it under foundation* or tinted SPF. Looks amazing over makeup, too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really love this product. It puts just the right amount of glow on my skin without looking too shiny. I can use it under or over foundation and it looks great. It does not further dry out my very dry skin. Definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love love love this product. I mix it with my moisturizer and it gives my skin the best sun kissed glow! Cannot say enough good things about this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AMAZINGGG AND GLOWY
reviews.reviewText: This adds a perfect natural glow under my makeup on my pale skin! It smells really nice & it comes in a luxurious glass bottle too <3

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: it was nice just more of a bronzer than glow i will be getting star glow instead

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: super lightweight on skin and easy to apply! new favorite product for everyday wear!! i purchased the small bottle just to try but would definitely consider getting the big one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: love this. thats all there is to say

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars it’s the mini size
reviews.reviewText: I love this product but it’s the mini size and i bold it in case you didn’t know like i didn’t either

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars glowy but pricey
reviews.reviewText: this product will leave your skin glowy and bronzed. i mix mine in with my primer and it gives off a bright glow but not an oily glow. first time i used it layered with my makeup i got so many compliments. makes me feel tanner for sure. this is pricey but does what it says
